trans-unit.source: Provides an interface to replace COM-based data binding in an application upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un'interfaccia per sostituire l'associazione di dati basato su COM in un'applicazione aggiornata da Visual Basic 6.0.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBinding"></xref> to a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adds a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBinding"></xref> to a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBindingCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che contiene i dati.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> that contains a property name.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref> che contiene un nome di propriet√†.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> that contains the name of a data field.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref> che contiene il nome di un campo dati.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Facoltativa.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IDataFormatDisp"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IDataFormatDisp"> </xref> interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Facoltativa.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> that contains the key value.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref> che contiene il valore della chiave.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBinding"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBinding"> </xref> interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of binding objects.
trans-unit.target: Cancella la raccolta di oggetti di associazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of bindings in the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero totale di associazioni di <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBindingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> that contains the count.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""> </xref> che contiene il conteggio.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data member for a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il membro dati per un <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBindingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the data member.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il nome del membro dati.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source for a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'origine dati per un <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBindingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A COM-based <xref uid="langword_csharp_msdatasrc.DataSource" name="msdatasrc.DataSource" href=""></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Basato su COM <xref uid="langword_csharp_msdatasrc.DataSource" name="msdatasrc.DataSource" href=""> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBinding"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBinding"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the index.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta l'indice.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBinding"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBinding"> </xref> interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: Removes a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBinding"></xref> interface from a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove un <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBinding"> </xref> interfaccia da un <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBindingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the index.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta l'indice.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current row from the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBindingCollection"></xref> object's data source and resets the contents of controls bound through the object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la riga corrente dal <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBindingCollection"> </xref> dell'oggetto origine dati e reimposta il contenuto dei controlli associato tramite l'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the UpdateMode for a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBindingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il UpdateMode per un <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBindingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An UpdateMode enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione UpdateMode.
